<div id="b-city_description">
<h2 class="lp-section-header">Peachy City of Historic Importance</h3>
<p>Home to the world’s busiest airport and a vibrant arts scene, Atlanta has an important role in US history. The gateway to the American South, it's home to barbecue and hundreds of peach trees that make it a surprisingly green city.</p>
<p>Hartsfield-Jackson Airport is the main arrival point, and Booking.com has an excellent range of Atlanta hotels near the airport. However, the main sights are clustered around Downtown. Near the gold-domed Georgia State Capitol is Underground Atlanta, a shopping center at the former downtown street level.</p>
<p>Just north are a few hotels near Georgia Dome, a huge sports venue, and to its northeast is Centennial Olympic Park, commemorating the 1996 Olympic Games. On one edge of this park are the CNN headquarters with behind-the-scenes tours. Across the street is the New World of Coca-Cola where you can sample all their worldwide products. Next door is the massive Georgia Aquarium, the world’s largest indoor aquarium.</p>
<p>In the Auburn district is Martin Luther King, Jr.’s former home and church, and a museum dedicated to him and the Civil Rights movement. A few blocks south in Grant Park is the city zoo, and the Atlanta Cyclorama and museum, detailing the city’s Civil War battles. </p>
<p>More national history is in the Carter Center, and the former home of Margaret Mitchell, author of "Gone with the Wind.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<li class="destination-reviews__item ">
<div class="destination-reviews__user-details">
<div class="destination-reviews__user-info">
<h4>Netricka</h4>
<span class="destination-reviews__country-name">United States of America</span>
</div>
<div class="destination-reviews__user-avatar">
<div class="destination-reviews__user-avatar__img">
<img class="avatar-mask ava-pad-bottom ava-default" src="https://s-ec.bstatic.com/static/img/review/avatars/ava-n/d3882ab9674d57559f4b0ecc7f2b01ecbc7a8057.png" alt=""
onerror="this.onerror = null;this.src = 'https://s-ec.bstatic.com/static/img/review/avatars/ava-n/d3882ab9674d57559f4b0ecc7f2b01ecbc7a8057.png';">

<span class="review-score-badge" >
10
</span>

<h4 class="destination-reviews__title">I really enjoyed my stay in Atlanta.</h4>
<p class="toggle-long-text__content">
I really enjoyed my stay in Atlanta. Whether it is your first time visiting or you have been multiple times, get the city pass so you can see the many attractions that Atlanta has to offer. If you can, try to eat at Polaris and Atlanta Breakfast Club. I really enjoyed Atlanta and I will be back soon. I walked to the aquarium from my hotel and I took Lyft to places that were further way.
</p>
</div>
</li>
<li class="destination-reviews__item last">
<div class="destination-reviews__user-details">
<div class="destination-reviews__user-info">
<h4>Nicole</h4>
<span class="destination-reviews__country-name">United States of America</span>
</div>
<div class="destination-reviews__user-avatar">
<div class="destination-reviews__user-avatar__img">
<img class="avatar-mask ava-pad-bottom ava-default" src="https://graph.facebook.com/v2.9/10205893962081596/picture?type=square&height=64&width=64" alt=""
onerror="this.onerror = null;this.src = 'https://s-ec.bstatic.com/static/img/review/avatars/ava-n/d3882ab9674d57559f4b0ecc7f2b01ecbc7a8057.png';">
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="destination-reviews__review">
<span class="destination-reviews__item-arrow"></span>
  
<span  class=" review-score-widget review-score-widget__exceptional review-score-widget__score-only      review-score-widget__no-subtext    " data-et-click="customGoal:adUAAdCMAZTZWKNYT:1" data-et-mouseenter="customGoal:adUAAdCMAZTZWKNYT:2"  >
<span class="review-score-badge" >
10
</span>
</span>
<h4 class="destination-reviews__title">Excellent!</h4>
<p class="toggle-long-text__content">
Excellent! Lots to see and do. Great night life for the Single or the Adults only escapade. Also great day time sight seen for the entire family. Big city with small town feel. Will definitely go back!
</p>
</div>
</li>
<li class="destination-reviews__item ">
<div class="destination-reviews__user-details">
<div class="destination-reviews__user-info">
<h4>Stephanie</h4>
<span class="destination-reviews__country-name">United States of America</span>
</div>
<div class="destination-reviews__user-avatar">
<div class="destination-reviews__user-avatar__img">
<img class="avatar-mask ava-pad-bottom ava-default" src="https://s-ec.bstatic.com/static/img/review/avatars/ava-s/d321d61d78a8fa310843e1967dca38e6276b92aa.png" alt=""
onerror="this.onerror = null;this.src = 'https://s-ec.bstatic.com/static/img/review/avatars/ava-s/d321d61d78a8fa310843e1967dca38e6276b92aa.png';">

<div class="destination-reviews__review">

<span  class=" review-score-widget review-score-widget__very_good review-score-widget__score-only      review-score-widget__no-subtext    " data-et-click="customGoal:adUAAdCMAZTZWKNYT:1" data-et-mouseenter="customGoal:adUAAdCMAZTZWKNYT:2"  >
<span class="review-score-badge" >
8.0
</span>
</span>
<h4 class="destination-reviews__title">The zoo was the highlight of the trip.</h4>
<p class="toggle-long-text__content">
The zoo was the highlight of the trip. Buckhead saloon is a good atmosphere for causal drinking and socializing.Want some shopping I do not recommend phips mall its pricey but the and theater was very delightful. As far as driving I was lost even with GPS a lot
</p>
</div>
</li>
<li class="destination-reviews__item last">
<div class="destination-reviews__user-details">
<div class="destination-reviews__user-info">
<h4>Christine</h4>
<span class="destination-reviews__country-name">United States of America</span>
</div>
<div class="destination-reviews__user-avatar">
<div class="destination-reviews__user-avatar__img">
<img class="avatar-mask ava-pad-bottom ava-default" src="https://t-ec.bstatic.com/static/img/review/avatars/ava-c/315f92289c481a16de5ee7737aa1b5fd531afcce.png" alt=""
onerror="this.onerror = null;this.src = 'https://t-ec.bstatic.com/static/img/review/avatars/ava-c/315f92289c481a16de5ee7737aa1b5fd531afcce.png';">
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="destination-reviews__review">
<span class="destination-reviews__item-arrow"></span>
  
<span  class=" review-score-widget review-score-widget__exceptional review-score-widget__score-only      review-score-widget__no-subtext    " data-et-click="customGoal:adUAAdCMAZTZWKNYT:1" data-et-mouseenter="customGoal:adUAAdCMAZTZWKNYT:2"  >
<span class="review-score-badge" >
10
</span>
</span>
<h4 class="destination-reviews__title">I'm an Atlanta native but I have not been to everything...</h4>
<p class="toggle-long-text__content">
I'm an Atlanta native but I have not been to everything nor do I know where everything is in Atlanta but it's worth it! The southern hospitality, the culture, the vibes, the music, the people, the scenery, and the food is amazing. Plus we get all four seasons here and not just hot or cold all year long. I would definitely take Marta for places here because the traffic can get pretty hectic. I recently ate at a restaurant called Barrelhouse and the food was pretty good and not too bad on the wallet either. Hudson Grille is good and I love the Cheesecake Factory at Lenox Mall! Sprinkles. Cupcakes has this salted oatmeal cookie and it was fresh out the oven....omg! For thrills I like Andretti car racing and Six Flags but I would love to try sky diving at Sky Atlanta. National Museum of American history, King Center, Georgia Aquarium, World of Coca Cola are good places for families.
</p>
</div>
</li>

<div id="revc_write_a_review_login_intro" style="display:none;">
<h3>Verified reviews from real guests.</h3><p>We have more than 70 million property reviews, and they're all from <strong>real, verified guests.</strong>
<div class="rlp-intro">
<div class="rlp-intro__container clearfix">
<h3 class="rlp-intro__title">How does it work?</h3>
<ul class="rlp-intro-how">
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--tickfull">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--tickfull">1</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-tickfull"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">It starts with a booking</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">The only way to leave a review is to first make a booking. That's how we know our reviews come from real guests who have stayed at the property.</p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__arrow fl">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__arrow-icon bicon-rightchevron"></p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--citytrip">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--citytrip">2</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-citytrip"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">Followed by a trip</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">When guests stay at the property, they check out how quiet the room is, how friendly the staff is, and more.</p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__arrow fl">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__arrow-icon bicon-rightchevron"></p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--feedback">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--feedback">3</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-feedback"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">And finally, a review</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">After their trip, guests tell us about their stay. We check for naughty words and verify the authenticity of all guest reviews before adding them to our site.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
<p>If you booked through us and want to leave a review, please sign in first.</p>
<div class="intro_footer">
<a href="https://secure.booking.com/reviewtimeline.html" class="revc_write_a_review_login_button">Sign in and leave a review</a>
</div>
</div>

Atlanta 6.9 Review score 1,522 reviews Description Review All 365 properties in Atlanta Atlanta was highly rated for food by 6,810 guests from the United States! Atlanta Travel Guide Peachy City of Historic Importance Home to the world’s busiest airport and a vibrant arts scene, Atlanta has an important role in US history. The gateway to the American South, it's home to barbecue and hundreds of peach trees that make it a surprisingly green city. Hartsfield-Jackson Airport is the main arrival point, and Booking.com has an excellent range of Atlanta hotels near the airport. However, the main sights are clustered around Downtown. Near the gold-domed Georgia State Capitol is Underground Atlanta, a shopping center at the former downtown street level. Just north are a few hotels near Georgia Dome, a huge sports venue, and to its northeast is Centennial Olympic Park, commemorating the 1996 Olympic Games. On one edge of this park are the CNN headquarters with behind-the-scenes tours. Across the street is the New World of Coca-Cola where you can sample all their worldwide products. Next door is the massive Georgia Aquarium, the world’s largest indoor aquarium. In the Auburn district is Martin Luther King, Jr.’s former home and church, and a museum dedicated to him and the Civil Rights movement. A few blocks south in Grant Park is the city zoo, and the Atlanta Cyclorama and museum, detailing the city’s Civil War battles. More national history is in the Carter Center, and the former home of Margaret Mitchell, author of "Gone with the Wind. 뉅 뀡 뉅 뉅 덀 녴 덀 녴 Save time, save money! Whether it is your first time visiting or you have been multiple times, get the city pass so you can see the many attractions that Atlanta has to offer. If you can, try to eat at Polaris and Atlanta Breakfast Club. I really enjoyed Atlanta and I will be back soon. I walked to the aquarium from my hotel and I took Lyft to places that were further way. Nicole United States of America 10 Excellent! Excellent! Lots to see and do. Great night life for the Single or the Adults only escapade. Also great day time sight seen for the entire family. Big city with small town feel. Will definitely go back! Stephanie United States of America 8.0 The zoo was the highlight of the trip. The zoo was the highlight of the trip. Buckhead saloon is a good atmosphere for causal drinking and socializing. Want some shopping I do not recommend phips mall its pricey but the and theater was very delightful. As far as driving I was lost even with GPS a lot Christine United States of America 10 I'm an Atlanta native but I have not been to everything... I'm an Atlanta native but I have not been to everything nor do I know where everything is in Atlanta but it's worth it! The southern hospitality, the culture, the vibes, the music, the people, the scenery, and the food is amazing. Plus we get all four seasons here and not just hot or cold all year long. I would definitely take Marta for places here because the traffic can get pretty hectic. I recently ate at a restaurant called Barrelhouse and the food was pretty good and not too bad on the wallet either. Hudson Grille is good and I love the Cheesecake Factory at Lenox Mall! Sprinkles. Cupcakes has this salted oatmeal cookie and it was fresh out the oven....omg! For thrills I like Andretti car racing and Six Flags but I would love to try sky diving at Sky Atlanta. National Museum of American history, King Center, Georgia Aquarium, World of Coca Cola are good places for families.
